properties.Description:
7travel is Australia’s premier travel destination, with specially curated travel packages that offer amazing value for friends, couples or families.

Implementation is Web-based and features custom screen-sets

The Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC) is Australia's national public broadcaster, owned and funded by the government. The ABC plays a leading role in the history of broadcasting in Australia. With a total annual budget of A$1.22 billion,[1] the corporation provides television, radio, online and mobile services throughout metropolitan and regional Australia, as well as overseas through the Australia Network and Radio Australia.

The implementation is part of a SSO Site Group, using a centralised login page
Sites using centralised login page include: iview.abc.net.au, abc.net.au/abc3, hottest100.abc.net.au

Fitness First is the largest privately owned health club group in the world. It consists of more than 360 Fitness First clubs worldwide reaching just over 927,000 members in 16 countries.

Current implementation is a very simple one, REST API based, custom screen (already existing ones) are used.

ABS-CBN, also known as the Kapamilya Network, is a Filipino commercial broadcast television network that is the flagship property of ABS-CBN Corporation, a company under Lopez Group. The network is headquartered at the ABS-CBN Broadcasting Center in Quezon City, with additional offices and production facilities in 25 major cities including Iloilo, Cebu, and Davao. It is the oldest television network in the country, and also the largest in terms of revenues, assets, and international coverage. The network has been one of Asia’s pioneers in television, and now offers streaming media services online to internet and mobile devices.

ABS-CBN is implementing Gigya’s Registration-as- a-Service (RaaS) product to help users register, login, update profile information and password, and logout of the domains.

Campbell Soup Company (CSC) includes brands such as Campbell’s, Pepperidge Farm, Plum Organics, Food Service, Swanson, and Pace Sauces. The goal is to improve consumer experience and become better informed of things consumers are interested in. To support this, CSC is redesigning their websites, adding new mobile applications, and moving to a centralized registration platform to support plans to expand globally.

The first Gigya release focused on the prioritized attributes from the CSC consumer data model, but was limited to one site, Campbell's Kitchen (https://www.campbells.com/kitchen/), for the first phase of the project. As multiple brands share the same user repository, the existing registration database/identity master will need to co-exist with the new Gigya registration process, until all brands and users are migrated over to the Gigya platform.

Gigya Professional Services continuously engages with CSC to provide thought leadership, best practices and subject matter expertise for architecting and designing a global Gigya solution. In addition, Gigya Professional Services actively mentors CSC’s development teams on the Gigya development tasks needed to priorities website and mobile initiatives, and partners closer with their development partners.

Campbell Soup Company (CSC) includes brands such as Campbell’s, Pepperidge Farm, Plum Organics, Food Service, Swanson, and Pace Sauces. The goal is to improve consumer experience and become better informed of things consumers are interested in. To support this, CSC is redesigning their websites, adding new mobile applications, and moving to a centralized registration platform to support plans to expand globally.

The first Gigya release focused on the prioritized attributes from the CSC consumer data model, but was limited to one site, Campbell's Kitchen (https://www.campbells.com/kitchen/), for the first phase of the project. As multiple brands share the same user repository, the existing registration database/identity master will need to co-exist with the new Gigya registration process, until all brands and users are migrated over to the Gigya platform.

Gigya Professional Services continuously engages with CSC to provide thought leadership, best practices and subject matter expertise for architecting and designing a global Gigya solution. In addition, Gigya Professional Services actively mentors CSC’s development teams on the Gigya development tasks needed to priorities website and mobile initiatives, and partners closer with their development partners.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
REI has recently begun implementation of a unified identification system to support SSO across REI.com + related subdomains/applications and it's Adventure Proejcts domains + related applications. There is a clause within the contract that allows REI to back out of it's 3 year agreement should the project miss its go-live date. Taylor Vallone is personally leading to project to ensure that we can deliver on this timeline.

PROJECT NOTES
Phase 1 of REI's Gigya implementation includes 2 releases: 1) switching to Gigya REST APIs for new account registration and 2) switching to Gigya REST APIs for login. REI launched part 1 on rei.com on Dec. 12th, 2017. Part 2 is still TBD, but should be live soon. Note: Gigya screen-sets integration is planned for a later release in 2018.

Seven West Media is Australia’s leading multiple platform media company with a market-leading presence in broadcast television, magazine and newspaper publishing and online.

Seven launched a digital cornerstone to it’s brand for coverage of the Australian Open and other tennis tournaments, available to all Australians across broadcast television and connected devices, including the 7Tennis mobile apps

Fairfax Media Limited is an innovative and digitally progressive media company in Australia and New Zealand - the trusted voice informing, engaging and entertaining audiences and communities via newspapers, websites, radio stations, events and dynamic digital ventures.

Brisbane Times website includes a Lite Registration form to Sign up for daily wrap of the news.

Goodlife Health Clubs is one of the fastest growing gym networks with 77 locations across Australia supporting over 200,000 members to live healthier and more active lifestyles. It's our mission to get more Australians moving and living the Goodlife - whether it's fitting into those still-holding-onto-hope jeans, getting the kids to school on time, running a marathon or simply finding 20 minutes in each day to breathe. Along with industry-leading programs and top-of-the-range equipment, we offer a range of flexible and affordable memberships to help make the first (and often hardest) step to improving your health and fitness easy and excuse-free.

Jetstar Airways Pty Ltd (Jetstar), is an Australian value-based airline headquartered in Melbourne, Australia, and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Qantas. The airline operates an extensive domestic network as well as regional and international services from its main base at Melbourne Airport, using a mixed fleet of the Airbus A320 family and the Boeing 787 Dreamliner. Jetstar operates over 4,000 flights weekly to more than 75 destinations worldwide, and carries 8.5% of all passengers travelling in and out of Australia. Qantas, through the Jetstar Group, also has stakes in sister airlines Jetstar Asia Airways, Jetstar Pacific Airlines and Jetstar Japan.

This project will initially cover the implementation of CIAM (Gigya) for Jetstar Airways Pty Ltd on to four web properties, mobile native mobile app (iOS, Android).

For more than 10 years Australians have turned to Kidspot to help them solve their parenting problems. With information and advice to help mums and dads through every stage – from pregnancy to parenting teens – it’s no wonder that Kidspot is a trusted source for more than a million Aussies every month.

This website is part of a NLM Site Group including vogue.com.au, kidspot.com.au, delicious.com.au.

Kidspot offers a Preference Center for a program called 'Mums Say reviews'
This website is part of a NLM Site Group including vogue.com.au, kidspot.com.au, delicious.com.au

Vogue.com.au provides comprehensive runway coverage of all the major fashion shows, authoritative reports on seasonal trends, the latest social, celebrity and fashion news, and lively, informed takes on fashion and pop culture, as well as unprecedented access inside the magazine, including daily blogs from editorial team members, behind-the-scenes coverage and more.

This website is part of a NLM Site Group including vogue.com.au, kidspot.com.au, delicious.com.au

The ultimate kitchen resource with 50000 free recipes, plus menus, videos and cooking tips. Australia's #1 food site.

This website is part of a NLM Site Group including vogue.com.au, kidspot.com.au, delicious.com.au

GQ AUstralia is the unchallenged leader in the premium men's lifestyle magazine market and was the fastest growing consumer magazine over 2009/2010. Success with style is the ethos around which GQ is created and each issue is a provocative mix of the very best writing, strong visuals and an unrivalled sense of achievement, intelligence and irreverence.

This website is part of a NLM Site Group including vogue.com.au, kidspot.com.au, delicious.com.au

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Sony Pictures TV is an Identity customer using Gigya across two primary business units, Internet Services Group (ISG) and Sony Pictures TV. They have access to unlimited domains and are on 60 hour quarterly retainer. They have been implementing steadily, most recently with Asian sites. Adoption continues to grow.

PROJECT NOTES
Sony is showing a different set of 'sign up' screensets depending on the visitor's IP address. If user has a Russian IP, then the user will see Russian language and register on Sony's Russian site on RU server. All other registrants would see english and be registered on US server. Phase 1: Nov 21, 2017 - Jan 15, 2018 Users can sign up to be alerted when submissions open on Jan 16th Phase 2: Jan 16, 2018 - TBD Users can return to enter the contest

The West Australian is a leading news source in Perth and WA. Breaking local and world news from sport and business to lifestyle and current affairs.

Mobile app is available in iOS and Android
Cricket Australia is the custodian of cricket in Australia with a vision to be Australia's favourite sport.

Woolworths Limited is a major Australian company with extensive retail interest throughout Australia and New Zealand.

Implementation is based on REST API, no screensets or social at the moment
